roleset.name: move back and forth, usually a body part
roleset.note: WAG-V NOTES: Frames file for 'wag' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 40.3.1 and 40.3.2; Framenet entry Body movement. (from wag.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: In answer the little dog wagged its tail several times
